sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
likely
, je najbrž res ali se bo verjetno zgodilo.

seg.quote: It seemed hardly likely that they would agree.
What kind of change is likely?

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
likely to do something
, bo tisto verjetno storil.

seg.quote: They were not likely to forget it.

sense.def:
Very likely
ali
most likely
pomeni verjetno.

seg.quote: Most likely it will be a woman.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
likely
opisujemo osebe, ki bodo verjetno primerne za določen namen.

seg.quote: The local committee is always looking out for likely recruits.
